AI Description: Panaroo is a pangenome visualization tool that allows users to compare and analyze pangenomes from microbial species. It provides an interactive and intuitive interface for exploring gene presence and absence within pangenomes.
Core Features: Visualization Of Pangenomes, Interactive Exploration Of Gene Presence & Absence, Comparison Of Multiple Microbial Species, Identification Of Core & Accessory Genes, Detection Of Genomic Variations
General Tags: Pangenome Analysis, Microbial Genomics, Bioinformatics, Genome Visualization
